Description: <BACK TO JOBSJob Title: Warehouse ExecutiveJob Code: 184/001/209Location: DubaiSalary: Up to AED 5,000Industry: ManufacturingJob Responsibilities:– Organize and maintain inventory and storage area.– Ensure shipments’ and inventory transactions’ accuracy.– Communicate job expectations and coach employees.– Determine staffing levels and assign workload.– Interface with customers to answer questions or solve problems.– Maintain item records, document necessary information, and utilize reports to project warehouse status.– Identify areas of improvement and establish innovative or adjust existing work procedures and practices.– Confer and coordinate activities with other departments.Job Requirements:– 4 – 5 years of experience in warehouse management.– Ability to manage the factory in terms of inbound and outbound logistics, administration, factory compliances, driver schedules, etc. – Handling and supervising container loading/unloading, and material movement in and out of the warehouse.– Understanding the safety and security of the warehouse and general inter-departmental coordination.– Has previously worked in the manufacturing industry.Please visit our jobs page to check out our current list of jobs in UAE and across the world.Follow us on LinkedIn and Facebook to stay updated regarding our upcoming opportunities.Subscribe to our LinkedIn newsletter for weekly job updates.<BACK TO JOBSJob Details
